The sum of two fractions is greater than one of them.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

 The sum of two fractions is greater than one of them.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
statement: ltaddnq $p |- ( ( A e. Q. /\ B e. Q. ) -> A <Q ( A +Q B ) ) $.
